name: Instabilliards
description:
3D Billiards with energy balls and unstable crystals.

Shoot balls loaded with energy into the unstable crystal cubes until they break. Stored energy is represented by color from green (low) to red (high). Crystals break after reaching a certain threshold. Energy is generated and stored in the balls based on the speed of each collision and released when hitting a crystal. The ball that breaks a crystal gets destroyed and excess energy is added to the total score.

I didn't really have time to add a win screen or different levels, but the game is supposed to be over when all crystals are destroyed.

Also, the balls are meant to be unstable as well and explode when loaded with too much energy, but since I had no time to add audio / visual feedback for the exploding balls I felt like it would be too confusing, so I removed it for now.

Controls:

Mouse - Aim and hold left mouse button to shoot by moving the cue forward
R - Restart level
Esc - Quit game

You can move around freely while balls are in play and moving using wasd, shift, space and left alt / ctrl.

Thanks for playing!!
